comments.body: this changed the type from `string` to `[]string`... will that break compatibility with decoding any existing tokens?
If Azure happily changed it in their codebase, I assumed things would be fine. :man_shrugging: (note that this is only a patch release bump too)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@// See examples for how to use this with your own claim types
type StandardClaims struct {
	Audience  []string `json:"aud,omitempty"`
	ExpiresAt int64  `json:"exp,omitempty"`
	Id        string `json:"jti,omitempty"`
